resources.string: Insert your email address and click on the bottom to reset the password.\n We send you an email with the instructions to set a new password

1. Put ALL the three IMU sensors on a flat surface and don't touch it till the LED stop blinking and stays ON.


2.Move ALL the three IMU sensors manually as you draw an 8 in two perpendicular directions.


3.When the IMU sensors LEDs switch OFF the calibration is done.
Press the bottom below to start initialize the communication

In this page you have to sign in through two possible ways:


- (RECOMMENDED) clicking the 'Sign in with google' dedicated button and providing access through Google Services


- inserting manually the Email and Password of your account and then press 'LOG IN' button.


For both the ways, selecting the 'Keep me logged in' box will save your credentials for automatic access the next times.
 In each of the following pages, there will be a 'LOG OUT' option to go back to the Login page.


If you are not registered yet, click on the 'Register' text.


If you forgot your password, click on the 'Forgot Password' text.

In this page you have to register manually by inserting the following personal information.


Once you are done, by clicking on the 'REGISTER' button you create an account.


Then, go back to Login page and insert the credentials just created and click on the 'LOG IN' button.
 An email will be sent instantly to your email address, you have to open it and confirm your identity.


Then, go back to Login page and by inserting your credentials and by clicking on 'LOG IN' button you can have access and be redirected to the next page.

In this page you can add patients by clicking on the green + at the bottom.

 Once clicked, a dialog will appear in which you have to add the ID Patient and optionally other information and the telephone number.


- By clicking on ⋮ at the extreme right of the ID Patient you can edit information or delete the patient.


- By clicking on the Person icon at the top left of the page, or by swiping the entire page to the right, a menu with your information of access and many other functions is provided.

In this page all the information of the ID Patient added previously are visible.


- By clicking on the blue telephone icon you can see the telephone number added and if you want by clicking 'CALL' you will be redirected to the phone service of the smartphone.


- By clicking on the violet download icon you will open the archive where you can see all the previous recording files.
 You can download it or delete it by clicking on the appropriate icons at the extreme right of the filename.


- The four boxes represent 4 sensors and each one can be easily activated or not by managing the switch below.
 Clicking on the desired sensor you will be redirected to the following page to start initialize the communication.

In this page we will see all the following recording steps:


- initialize the communication and sensors.


- select the recording type (MANUAL or TIMER).


- add info of the recording.


- do the calibraton of the IMU sensors.


- manage the recording in real time with the possibility to add real time updates on postures and extra info.


- download the file of the recording at the end and go to a new recording.


WARNINGS:


- a green checkmark ✓ icon will indicate the correct behaviour of the communication and the sensors.


- a yellow exclamation point ! icon will indicate on or more sensors do not work correctly, clicking on it more information will be provided.


- a red low battery icon will indicate on or more sensors need the change of the batteries, clicking on it more information will be provided.


- a red cross x icon will indicate the communication is dead and it will force to go back initialize everything again.
In this page you can download the most recent user guides by clicking on the buttons present or you can send an email to the support service by clicking on the email address or copy and paste it.
